description: "Although the title is in English, all the other text on this map of Southeast Asia is in French (and versions with French titles were also produced). Hand-coloured regional borders, rivers and settlements are featured."
title: "Asia [map] : according to the Sieur d'Anville, divided into its empires kingdoms & states, showing the European settlements in the East Indies, and all the new discoveries, made by the Russians, the Dutch and the English.."
